channel.title: Gielinor
channel.description:
Oh hey look what I found in Windows.old :D Well here's [I]my [/I]delta leech lolz releasing this because i just cbf'd to finish it and i found out client was bugged when connecting so here server: [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/4871844/547a7289/Server_317.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/4871844/547a7289/Server_317.html[/url] mirror: [url=http://www.MegaShare.com/590629]http://www.MegaShare.com/590629[/url] client: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=NCAORZ4Z]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=NCAORZ4Z[/url] atleast it aint 100% a leech LOL more like 95% client works to 127.0.0.1 i cbf to change it my ip is in there lol go ahead and 'botnet' me. was playing with a sprite dump and added like hitmarks and cross and etc. just fun stuff you can remove if u want. and if you want to bring back the old ds quests just add em back again in the quest journal i added my own quest just to waste time and i also added quite a bit other little tiny teeny things but w/e now im not actually working on a server just little stuff like minigames which ill be releasin too lolz credits: 100% - Delta 0% - Me ^- this way i cant be flamed for no shittin reason Regards, ~LP
That's a couple features, yeah? Anyways. Yeah. If you don't like it, suggest what I could to do make it better, or don't post your pathetic attempt to make me feel bad, because it won't fucking work, and I won't fucking give a damn, and you'll just be wasting your time. Estimated completion date: Unknown Dragon claws special: Hits a random number up to 25, then that number divided by 2, then divided by 3, then finally divided by 4. I'm not exactly sure how it works but w/e. Also I am up for suggestions on the GFX and emote because I cbf with that. It only hits once but it tells you what your induvidual hits would have been if it hit four times. (Seen below) Pictures: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/dmdurr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ngec29.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/4rrw44.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/6htjds.jpg[/img] Added highscores: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/158595f.png[/img] [SIZE=6] Quests:[/SIZE] Druidic ritual - Once you complete the quest, you have unlocked access to Kaqemeex's herbalore store. I haven't started really making this quest yet. Summer's end - Not close to the way Jagex did it. Tbh Summer ain't even a spirit nor does she become one. But once you complete the quest, you have the option of buying Spirit shields from Summer. At first, only one shield is available, but once you "bless" a specific shield, it becomes available for purchase for 2/3 of the market price after. You can "bless" the shields by performing specific tasks in the spirit realm and being rewarded with gems that allow you to bless them via altars. I'm actually almost done with this quest. Current credits: [URL=http://"http://jagex.com"]Jagex[/URL] for the 317...Well, obob... Delta for the base, I suppose if you want to go technical you can look further back... Whoever made [URL=http://"https://substance.dev.java.net/"]substance[/URL] MITB for the XML reader thing whatever you dorks call it Rich for Items kept on Death thx lol ily Various members of google for models and such, support as well. All those technical people you know come before us and know all that technical stuff... Me for learning on the way and attempting to improve my Java programming abilities as much as humanly possible Of course, this is still under development so I'm not going to go super in-depth with pictures.

item.title: Gielinor
item.dc:creator: @The_Harlot The Harlot
item.description:
@The_Harlot wrote:

Looks good. Never use rapidshare or Uppit. One only allows 10 downloads (rapidshare) and uppit only downloads at 13kb per second. Use mediafire, allows as many people to download as you want, and downloads at 320kb per second. Nearly 25 times faster.

Read full topic

ps i made this like 2 months ago lol

item.title: Gielinor
item.dc:creator: @Godsent Godsent
item.description:
@Godsent wrote:

Oh hey look what I found in Windows.old

Well here’s my delta leech lolz releasing this because i just cbf’d to finish it and i found out client was bugged when connecting so here

server: http://www.2shared.com/file/4871844/547a7289/Server_317.html
mirror: http://www.MegaShare.com/590629
client: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=NCAORZ4Z

atleast it aint 100% a leech LOL more like 95%

client works to 127.0.0.1 i cbf to change it my ip is in there lol go ahead and ‘botnet’ me. was playing with a sprite dump and added like hitmarks and cross and etc. just fun stuff you can remove if u want.

and if you want to bring back the old ds quests just add em back again in the quest journal i added my own quest just to waste time and i also added quite a bit other little tiny teeny things but w/e

now im not actually working on a server just little stuff like minigames which ill be releasin too lolz

credits:
100% - Delta
0% - Me
^- this way i cant be flamed for no shittin reason

Regards,
~LP

That's a couple features, yeah?

Anyways. Yeah. If you don’t like it, suggest what I could to do make it better, or don’t post your pathetic attempt to make me feel bad, because it won’t fucking work, and I won’t fucking give a damn, and you’ll just be wasting your time.

Estimated completion date: Unknown

Dragon claws special: Hits a random number up to 25, then that number divided by 2, then divided by 3, then finally divided by 4. I’m not exactly sure how it works but w/e. Also I am up for suggestions on the GFX and emote because I cbf with that. It only hits once but it tells you what your induvidual hits would have been if it hit four times. (Seen below)

Pictures:

dmdurr.jpg770×551

2ngec29.jpg333×562


Added highscores:

[SIZE=6] Quests:[/SIZE]
Druidic ritual - Once you complete the quest, you have unlocked access to Kaqemeex’s herbalore store. I haven’t started really making this quest yet.

Summer’s end - Not close to the way Jagex did it. Tbh Summer ain’t even a spirit nor does she become one. But once you complete the quest, you have the option of buying Spirit shields from Summer. At first, only one shield is available, but once you “bless” a specific shield, it becomes available for purchase for 2/3 of the market price after. You can “bless” the shields by performing specific tasks in the spirit realm and being rewarded with gems that allow you to bless them via altars. I’m actually almost done with this quest.

Current credits:
Jagex for the 317…Well, obob…
Delta for the base, I suppose if you want to go technical you can look further back…
Whoever made substance
MITB for the XML reader thing whatever you dorks call it
Rich for Items kept on Death thx lol ily
Various members of google for models and such, support as well.
All those technical people you know come before us and know all that technical stuff…
Me for learning on the way and attempting to improve my Java programming abilities as much as humanly possible

Of course, this is still under development so I’m not going to go super in-depth with pictures.

Read full topic
